member.name: T:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages
member.summary: Provides controlled tab-based navigation that appears invisible to users but visible and customizable to developers at design-time, mimicking single-page-applications (SPAs).

member.name: M:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages.#ctor
member.summary: Provides controlled tab-based navigation which appears invisible to users but visible and customizable to developers, thus mimicking single-page-applications design.

member.name: P:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages.AllowTransitions
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether transitions are enabled.

member.name: P:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages.Transition
member.summary: Gets or sets the transition options to be applied when moving between pages.

member.name: P:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages.TransitionType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of transition to be used when moving from one page to another.

member.name: P:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages.Page
member.summary: Gets or sets the currently selected page.

member.name: P:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages.PageIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the currently selected page using its page index.

member.name: P:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages.PageTitle
member.summary: Gets or sets the currently selected page using its page title or text.

member.name: P:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages.PageName
member.summary: Gets or sets the currently selected page using its page name.

member.name: M:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages.SetPage(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the tab page that will be visible to the user.
member.param: The title of the tab page to set.
If set to true, the tab page name will be used instead of the page title when selecting; else, the default page title will be used by default.

member.name: M:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages.SetPage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the tab page that will be visible to the user.
member.param: The tab page index to be set.

member.name: M:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages.SetPage(System.Windows.Forms.TabPage)
member.summary: Sets the tab page that will be visible to the user.
member.param: The tab page to be set.

member.name: M:Bunifu.UI.WinForms.BunifuPages.OnSelecting(System.Windows.Forms.TabControlCancelEventArgs)
member.param: Provides data for the 'Selecting' and 'Deselecting' events of a control.
